text: Silo is a genus of caddisflies in the family Goeridae. There are about 11 described species in Silo. ==Species== * Silo alupkensis Martynov, 1917 * Silo chrisiammos Malicky, 1984 * Silo duplex Hagen, 1964 * Silo graellsii Pictet, 1865 * Silo mediterraneus McLachlan, 1884 * Silo nigricornis (Pictet, 1834) * Silo pallipes (Fabricius, 1781) * Silo piceus (Brauer, 1857) * Silo proximus Martynov, 1913 * Silo rufescens (Rambur, 1842) * Silo tuberculatus Martynov, 1909 ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trichoptera genera Category:Integripalpia
title: Silo (insect)
